name: @gauntface/dracula-ui
description: A broken up, CSS only version of dracula-ui
author: Netto Farah & Zeno Rocha & Matt Gaunt-Seo

scripts.build-example: rm -rf example/static/third_party/dracula-ui/ && mkdir -p example/static/third_party/dracula-ui/ && cd build && cp -r . ../example/static/third_party/dracula-ui/
